name: SuicideAttemptAndSubstanceAbuseDiagnosisCodes
title: Suicide Attempt and Substance Abuse Diagnosis Codes
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnosis codes for suicide and self-inflicted poisoning by drugs or medicinal substances.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who attempted suicide or intentionally misused medications. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the Diagnosis, Active element.),(Inclusion Criteria: Diagnosis codes that indicate intentional overdose, substance abuse, or suicide attempt in an inpatient, emergency department, or observation setting should be included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Diagnosis codes that indicate accidental overdose or poisoning with the medication classes of interest should be excluded from this value set.)

concept.display: Suicide and self-inflicted poisoning by other specified drugs and medicinal substances
Suicide and self-inflicted poisoning by unspecified drug or medicinal substance

contains.display: Suicide and self-inflicted poisoning by other specified drugs and medicinal substances
Suicide and self-inflicted poisoning by unspecified drug or medicinal substance
